description:
The vassals of the Tokugawa clan scheme to uncover Kenshin’s hidden offspring.  “Have you heard of ‘gem eyes’”? An eye is drawn on the back of polished crystal, then inserted into the eye-sockets of the Bodhisattva statue; they are said to resemble real eyes. Kenshin supposedly commanded the crafting of gem-eyes as a memorial offering to Taehime. Now if those gem-eyes have the same characteristic as Kanetsugu’s eyes ... so laughs Ii Naomasa, audaciously.
Source: crunchyroll
